title: Add dictionary feature with AI voice pronunciation and definitions

requirements.text: Add a new 'Dictionary' section to the application with a dedicated tab in the main navigation
acceptanceCriteria: Dictionary tab appears in the main navigation alongside existing tabs (Chat, Math, Media, etc.)
Clicking the Dictionary tab navigates to the dictionary interface
Dictionary section is accessible from the main application view

requirements.text: Implement a backend word database containing over 250,000 English words with their definitions

quotes: in the dictionnary there are over 250 thaousand words

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores a comprehensive dictionary dataset with 250,000+ words
Each word entry includes the word text and its definition
Backend provides query methods to retrieve word definitions by word lookup

requirements.text: Create a dictionary search interface where users can look up words and view their definitions

quotes: you can also read what it means

acceptanceCriteria: Search input field allows users to type and search for words
Search results display the word and its full definition
Interface shows clear feedback when a word is not found
Search is case-insensitive and handles common variations

requirements.text: Implement AI-powered text-to-speech functionality that pronounces searched words using synthesized voice

quotes: the ai uses its voice to say the word

acceptanceCriteria: Each dictionary word result includes a 'Pronounce' or speaker button
Clicking the button triggers AI voice synthesis to speak the word aloud
Voice pronunciation uses Web Speech API or similar browser-based TTS
Audio playback is clear and audible with proper pronunciation

constraints: Use Web Speech API or browser-based text-to-speech for voice synthesis (no external API integrations)
Dictionary data must be stored and served from the backend canister
Maintain consistency with existing UI design patterns (Tailwind CSS, dark theme with teal/coral accents)
nonGoals: Advanced linguistic features like etymology, synonyms, or antonyms
Offline dictionary access or downloadable dictionary files
Custom voice selection or pronunciation customization
